Module com.cs2212.cardbound
Package com.cs2212.cardbound

Class SceneTools

java.lang.Object
com.cs2212.cardbound.SceneTools
public class SceneTools extends Object
A utility class that helps with managing and controlling scenes in a JavaFX project.
Since:
3/10/2024
Version:
1.0
Author:
Jacob Couture

  • Field Details

    • currentScaleX

      public static double currentScaleX
      The current X resolution scale. Default is 1.0, which is at 1280

    • currentScaleY

      public static double currentScaleY
      The current Y resolution scale. Default is 1.0, which is at 720

  • Method Details

    • fadeOutToScene

      public static void fadeOutToScene(javafx.event.ActionEvent e, String sceneName, int milliseconds, javafx.scene.Node rootPane)
      Fades out a scene and switches to a different one.
      Parameters:
      e - The event representing the action that led to this method being called.
      sceneName - The name of the fxml file belonging to the scene to be switched to.
      milliseconds - The amount of time in milliseconds it will take to fade out.
      rootPane - The root pane of the current scene.

    • fadeOutToScene

      public static void fadeOutToScene(javafx.scene.input.InputEvent e, String sceneName, int milliseconds, javafx.scene.Node rootPane)
      Fades out a scene and switches to a different one.
      See Also:
      • fadeOutToScene(ActionEvent, String, int, Node)

    • switchScene

      public static void switchScene(javafx.event.ActionEvent e, String sceneName) throws IOException
      Switches to a different scene.
      Parameters:
      e - The event representing the action that led to this method being called.
      sceneName - The name of the fxml file belonging to the scene to be switched to.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an error occurs during loading.

    • switchScene

      public static void switchScene(javafx.scene.input.InputEvent e, String sceneName) throws IOException
      Switches to a different scene.
      Throws:
      IOException
      See Also:
      • switchScene(ActionEvent, String)

    • fadeInScene

      public static void fadeInScene(javafx.scene.Node rootPane, int milliseconds)
      Fades in a scene.
      Parameters:
      rootPane - The root pane of the current scene.
      milliseconds - The amount of time in milliseconds it will take to fade in.

    • setScreenScale

      public static void setScreenScale(double screenResolutionX, double screenResolutionY, javafx.scene.layout.StackPane rootPane)
      Updates the scale of all the objects in the current scene.
      Parameters:
      screenResolutionX - the new horizontal screen resolution (e.g. 1280, 1920, etc)
      screenResolutionY - the new vertical screen resolution (e.g. 720, 1080, etc)
      rootPane - the root pane of the current scene

    • exitApplication

      public static void exitApplication()
      Exits the application upon being called.
